articles.title: Kim Jong Il Observes Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-2
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Observes Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-2
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the General Satellite Control and Command Centre to watch the process of launching the experimental communications satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 on Sunday.
					 He acquainted himself with the preparations made for the satellite launch.
					
					 After being briefed on the satellite launch, he observed the whole process of the satellite launch at the centre.
					
					 At 11:20 a.m. the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, a shining product of self-reliance, soared into space by carrier rocket Unha-2. It was smoothly and accurately put into its orbit 9 minutes and 2 seconds after being completely separated from the carrier rocket.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that scientists and technicians of the DPRK successfully launched the satellite with their own wisdom and technology, he highly appreciated their feats and extended thanks to them.
					
					 It is a striking demonstration of the might of our Juche-oriented science and technology that our scientists and technicians developed both the multistage carrier rocket and the satellite with their own wisdom and technology 100 percent and accurately put the satellite into orbit at one go, he noted, repeatedly praising the patriotic devotion of the scientists and technicians who are playing a vanguard role in the drive to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Stressing the need to bring about a new turn in conquering outer space and making a peaceful use of it on the basis of the successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, he set forth the important tasks to be fulfilled to do so.
					
					 He met with the scientists and technicians who have contributed to the satellite launch by devoting all their wisdom and enthusiasm with ardent patriotism and warmly encouraged them before having a photograph taken with them. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Secretary Jon Pyong Ho and First Vice-Department Director Ju Kyu Chang of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: KCNA on DPRK's Successful Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-2
articles.content:
KCNA on DPRK's Successful Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-2
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians of the DPRK have succeeded in putting satellite Kwangmyongsong-2, an experimental communications satellite, into orbit by means of carrier rocket Unha-2 under the state long-term plan for the development of outer space.
					 Unha-2, which was launched at the Tonghae Satellite Launching Ground in Hwadae County, North Hamgyong Province at 11:20 on April 5, Juche 98 (2009), accurately put Kwangmyongsong-2 into its orbit at 11:29:02, nine minutes and two seconds after its launch.
					
					The satellite is going round the earth along its elliptic orbit at the angle of inclination of 40.6 degrees at 490 km perigee and 1,426 km apogee. Its cycle is 104 minutes and 12 seconds.
					
					 Mounted on the satellite are necessary measuring devices and communications apparatuses.
					
					 The satellite is going round on its routine orbit.
					
					It is sending to the earth the melodies of the immortal revolutionary paeans "Song of General
						Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and measured information at 470 MHz. By the use of the satellite the relay communications is now underway by UHF frequency band.
					
					 The satellite is of decisive significance in promoting the scientific researches into the peaceful use of outer space and solving scientific and technological problems for the launch of practical satellites in the future.
					
					 Carrier rocket Unha-2 has three stages.
					
					 The carrier rocket and the satellite developed by the indigenous wisdom and technology are the shining results gained in the efforts to develop the nation's space science and technology on a higher level. 
					
					The successful satellite launch symbolic of the leaping advance made in the nation's space science and technology was conducted against the background of the stirring period when a high-pitched drive for bringing about a fresh great revolutionary surge is under way throughout the country to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation without fail by 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, under the far-reaching plan of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. This is powerfully encouraging the Korean people all out in the general advance.

articles.title: FIFA Urged to Take Appropriate Measure
articles.content:
FIFA Urged to Take Appropriate Measure
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Football Association, in a statement released on Sunday as regards the serious incident that happened at the football match of the final Asian qualifier of 2010 FIFA World Cup between the DPRK and south Korea held in south Korea, expressed the expectation that the FIFA would examine the whole process of the match and take an appropriate measure.
					 The statement says:
					
					 Main players of the football team of the DPRK could not get up due to serious vomiting, diarrhea and headache since the night on March 31, just a day before the match.
					
					 They were healthier than any others in ordinary days and they had their meals only in the place they put up. They were enthusiastic in the training till that day. It can be said that it was beyond all doubt that the incident was a product of a deliberate act perpetrated by adulterated foodstuff as they could not get up all of a sudden just before the match.
					
					 Moreover, the Oman chief referee was so seriously biased in refereeing at the match that he insisted the ball headed by our player into the goal mouth at about 6 minutes after the start of the second half of the match was not the goal. He also declared that the foul committed by the rival side about 3 minutes before the end of the match was our player's though it was an obvious foul on the part of the rival side, thus resulting in the loss of our team.
					
					 It was something surprising that the Japanese refereeing supervisor tacitly connived at this shameless behavior though he was obliged to ensure the fair refereeing.
					
					 The match thus turned into a theatre of plot-breeding and swindling. It is as clear as noonday that it was a product of the Lee Myung Bak group's moves for confrontation with the DPRK and a deliberate behavior bred by the unsavory forces instigated by it.
					
					 We sternly condemn the attitude of the Lee group, which runs the whole gamut of evil doings in violation of the noble idea of sports after betraying its fellow countrymen, as anti-reunification and treacherous moves to incite confrontation with the DPRK. We strongly urge the south Korean authorities to own full responsibility for such serious incident and promptly make an apology for what happened.
					
					 The DPRK Football Association will always remain true to the FIFA which regards friendship and peace as its mission and the sports idea. It once again vehemently denounces the south Korean authorities and the unsavory forces responsible for the incident and will closely follow their future acts.

articles.title: Anniversary of Chondoism Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Chondoism Observed
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Heaven Day Ceremony was held in Pyongyang Sunday to commemorate the 149th anniversary of the foundation of Chondoism.
					 Present there were Chairwoman Ryu Mi Yong, Advisor O Ik Je and officials of the Korean Chondoist Church Central Guidance Committee and Chondoists in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kang Chol Won, vice-chairman of the committee, said in his report at the ceremony that Chondoism was founded in the latter half of the 19th century guided by such ideas as "Rejection of West and Japan," "Promotion of the National Interests and Welfare of the People," "Broad Salvation of the People," and "Paradise," reflecting the patriotic desire and will of the Korean people to struggle against feudalism and aggression and the proud course of history covered by the Korean nation is recorded with the patriotic struggle of the Chondoists.
					
					 Noting that the reunification of the country has not yet been achieved because of the anti-reunification and confrontation moves stepped up by the Lee Myung Bak group hell-bent on sycophancy and dependence upon foreign forces, he stressed that all Chondoists who truly love the country and are concerned about the destiny of the nation should single-mindedly unite and wage a powerful nationwide struggle to frustrate the evermore vicious moves of traitor Lee Myung Bak to block reunification and escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 He called upon all the Chondoists in the north and the south to firmly unite under the banner of "By our nation itself" and devote their all to the sacred cause of achieving the independent national reunification.
					
					 The participants prayed for the earliest possible achievement of national reunification and the realization of the ideal of Chondoism.

articles.title: Sheer Sophism of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Dismissed
articles.content:
Sheer Sophism of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Dismissed
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors are letting loose a spate of sophism labeling the DPRK's satellite launch "violation of the UN resolution" and calling for "sanctions" in collusion with the United States and Japan. This is nothing but mean rhetoric of those ignorant of the trend of the times and the present reality.
					 Minju Joson Sunday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					  It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch poses no problem.
					
					 The group's assertion about "violation of the UN resolution" is nothing but a reckless foolish ploy to block the DPRK's legitimate development of sciences. It brings to light the true colors of the confrontation-minded maniacs who take issue with evil will with whatever compatriots in the north do.
					
					 The "sanctions" oft-repeated by the group quite contrary to the desire and will of the fellow countrymen is an act of treachery of those who consider dependence upon foreign forces and confrontation with fellow countrymen as their main job.
					
					 As a matter of fact, Japan is doing the worst things, while talking about "sanctions" against the DPRK under pretext of its satellite launch. Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as it is steeped in the extreme bitterness towards the DPRK to the marrow of its bones. Bereft of even an iota of soul of the nation, the Lee Myung Bak group is echoing the Japanese reactionaries' trumpeting about "sanctions" and imploring other countries to join in the "sanctions" against the DPRK. This is disgusting behaviors of the traitors to do harm to fellow countrymen, pursuant to the hostile policy of foreign forces toward the DPRK.
					
					 The present reality clearly proves once again that neither the inter-Korean relations can be improved nor can the desire of the fellow countrymen for independent reunification, peace and prosperity come true as long as the Lee group stays in power. 
					
					 The group would be well advised to behave itself, bearing in mind the consequences to be entailed by its moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Flailed
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Students Councils made public a statement on March 30 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for kicking up a reckless "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					 The statement accused the Lee group of again co-sponsoring "a resolution on the human rights issue" in the DPRK at the UN.
					
					 Recalling that Lee has stepped up his policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen over "the nuclear issue  and human rights issue in the north" ever since the outset of his office, the statement stressed that this has brought the inter-Korean relations to a stalemate and rendered the situation on the Korean Peninsula so tense that a war may break out at any moment.
					
					 The above-said racket kicked up by the group against this backdrop is a provocation to the north and an act of driving the present inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable catastrophe, the statement charged.
					
					 The organization in a statement on April 1 accused the "Ministry of Unification" of taking an action to disallow the visit to the DPRK by representatives of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration to attend the meeting of the co-chairmen of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 The statement held that the above-said action taken by the authorities under the pretext of "security," etc. was prompted by their intention to bar the organization incurring their displeasure from visiting the north, an undisguised suppression of the progressive forces and the reunification movement.
					
					 The recent action taken by the present "government" to put a brake on the work of the south side committee which groups political parties and organizations of broad strata of people in south Korea patently proves that it has no will to improve the inter-Korean relations, it noted, adding:
					
					 The Lee "government" had better step down for its responsibility for having deteriorated the south-north relations.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Media Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Media Assailed
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Press Trade Unions released a statement on March 26 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its frantic gag on the press. 
					 Recalling that the authorities arrested Ri Chun Gun, producer of PD Notebook from MBC, for disclosing the danger of the American beef in the wake of the recent detention of the chairman of the Yonhap TV News Trade Unions, the statement said that this brought the Lee regime's fascist nature into bolder relief.
					
					 There would be no one who would be afraid of the authorities' fascist suppression and tyranny, the statement noted, declaring that the media persons of conscience in south Korea would take the lead in the struggle to put an end to the Lee Myung Bak fascist dictatorial regime and build a genuine people's society.

articles.title: Police Suppression of Student Movement under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Police Suppression of Student Movement under Fire in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The General Student Council of Korea University and the Student Committee of the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on March 31 at which they condemned the puppet police for suppressing the student movement.
					 At the conference speakers disclosed the fact that the police issued summons Jin Sung Mo, chairman of the student committee of the above-said party, and Jong Thae Ho, chairman of the general student council of the said university, on March 25 and 26 to appear at the police station. 
					
					 They accused the police of bringing the charge of violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration" to them for the mere reason that they took part in a meeting to remember the slain evacuees in Ryongsan and a students' meeting held in demand of the solution to the issue of registration fee.
					
					 They blasted the security authorities for intensifying the watch and shadow operations against students this year.
					
					 Recalling that the authorities' suppression of the student movement began with watching and shadowing the student movement, etc. and developed into the fabrication of cases, they demanded them stop at once their unreasonable suppression.

articles.title: DPRK's Projected Satellite Launch Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Projected Satellite Launch Hailed Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's projected satellite launch for peaceful purposes has been supported by political parties and organizations in different countries.
					 The Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union released a statement on March 31, in which it expressed deep apprehension over the reckless moves being made by the United States and its followers to hinder the launch of the experimental communications satellite "Kwangmyongsong-2" by the DPRK, a sovereign state.
					
					 The statement said that the United States' outrageous interference in the internal affairs of the DPRK, a peace-loving state, is intended to dominate the world and, furthermore, violate the sovereignty of the DPRK and other countries.
					
					 This is, in essence, quite contrary to the "spirit of mutual respect and equality" contained in the September 19 Joint Statement, it pointed out.
					
					 It said that the Secretariat of the C.C., the Communist Party of the Soviet Union fully supports the steadfast stand of the Workers' Party of Korea led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the DPRK's policy of developing space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Also, the Czech, Moravian and Silesian Trade Unions' Association issued a statement on April 1, the Belarusian National Organization of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the National Social Federation "For the Union and Union's Communist Party" and the Belarus-DPRK National Friend Association Named after Kim Il Sung and the Belarusian Social Association "For Democracy, Social Progress and Justice" joint statements on April 2, and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK a statement on March 31, in support of the DPRK's projected satellite launch.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the Thai Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain sent letters of solidarity to the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Mar. 20 and 25.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past
 Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- The coordinator meeting of the International Solidarity Council Demanding Settlement of Japan's Past was held in China on March 28 and 29.
					 Attending the meeting were representatives of organizations and personages of various countries and regions affiliated to the said council including the DPRK, China, Indonesia and Japan.
					
					 The attendants of the meeting were informed of the activities conducted by the organizations in various countries and regions last year demanding Japan's redemption of its past.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of urging Japan to redress its crimes against humanity and conducting activities against Japan's distortion of history and its wild ambition for territorial expansion, including a campaign for putting pressure upon the parliaments of Japan and the Western European countries to institute a law on the "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army or adopt a relevant resolution with 2010, which will mark the lapse of 65 years since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists and the lapse of 100 years since the fabrication of the illegal "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", as a momentum.
					
					 It also discussed the matters of publishing books introducing the damage done by the Imperial Japanese Army in various countries and regions in the past and international solidarity activities demanding the compensation for it and regularly introducing through Internet the activities conducted by organizations of the council demanding Japan's redress of its past.
					
					 An appeal to the world peace-loving people was adopted there.
					
					 The appeal noted with serious concern that with the advent of the new century the world people ardently hoped that Japan would redress its past to enable them to live in a peaceful world free from war, but it has not yet made an apology and reparation for the crimes committed by it during the Second World War and, on the contrary, is again rushing headlong into militarization.
					
					 Earnestly calling for participation by an increasing number of people in the campaign demanding a final solution to the issue of Japan's redress of its past by August 2010, the appeal stressing the need to strongly oppose Japan's moves for militarization and distortion of history and its bid to attain permanent membership of the UNSC.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" was published in booklet by Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on March 28.
					 This work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively deals with ways to achieve great national unity including the issues of founding a reunified state through the unity of the whole nation, attaining unity on the basis of love for the nation and the spirit of national independence, promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, putting a halt to all political strife which stokes division and confrontation among fellow countrymen, realizing mutual trust and unity between the north and the south and not rejecting those with different isms but joining hands with each other for national reunification.

articles.title: April Holidays Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
April Holidays Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in France, film shows in Myanmar and Nepal and a reading session in Guinea between March 18 and 28 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said at the seminar that by holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission the DPRK could honorably defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation, meeting all forms of threats and challenges of the imperialist allied forces under his Songun leadership, and is now dynamically advancing towards the eminence of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 He noted with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il, basing himself on a scientific insight into the environment and actual conditions of the changed times, established the unique Songun political mode, an embodiment of the Juche idea, in all spheres, thus firmly defending socialism centered on the popular masses with arms.
					
					 The general director of the Ministry of Sports of Myanmar who is secretary general of the National Olympic Committee of Myanmar said before watching a film introducing the development of sports in the DPRK that the people of the DPRK have achieved great successes in socialist construction, single-mindedly united on the basis of the monolithic idea under the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 The principal of an international solidarity fund dressmaking school in Guinea said, after having a reading session on a book dealing with the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man, that socialist Korea's future is rosy as Kim Jong Il is conducting energetic activities, always full of optimism.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in France.

articles.title: ATCC informa  exitoso lanzamiento del satelite "Kwangmyongsong No.2"
articles.content:
ATCC informa  exitoso lanzamiento del satelite "Kwangmyongsong No.2"
Pyongyang, 5 de abril (ATCC) -- Segun el plan perspectivo estatal de desarrollo espacial nuestros cientificos y tecnicos lograron exitos en poner en la orbita el satelite artificial de la tierra "Kwangmyongsong No.2" con el cohete portador "Unha-No.2" 
					El cohete portador fue lanzado a las 11:20 del 5 de abril del 98 (2009) de la Era Juche en el Campo de Lanzamiento de Satelite  Tonghae en el distrito de Hwadae de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y puso correctamente en la orbita prevista a las 11:29:02, despues de 9 minutos y 2 segundos de su lanzamiento 
					
					  El satelite gira con el angulo de inclinacion de 40.6o por una orbita eliptica con distancia mas cercana a la tierra de 490km y la mas alejada de 1 426km. Su periodo es de 104 minutos y 12 segundos. 
					
					  El satelite dispone de los medios de medicion y comunicacion necesarios.
					
					  El satelite gira normalmente en su orbita.
					
					  Ahora, del satelite se transmiten en los 470MHz a la tierra las melodias de los inmortales himnos revolucionarios "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il" y los datos de medicion y por medio del satelite se realiza la comunicacion de la retransmision en la banda de frecuencias UHF.
					
					  El satelite tiene el significado decisivo en impulsar la investigacion cientifica por el uso del cosmos para fines pacificos y solucionar los problemas cientifico-tecnicos por el futuro lanzamiento de satelite de aplicacion practica.
					
					  El cohete portador "Unha-No.2" tiene tres escalones.
					
					  El cohete portador y el satelite artificial de la tierra fabricados con nuestras inteligencias y tecnicas devienen el orgulloso resultado logrado en la lucha por situar en el nivel mas alto las ciencias y tecnicas del pais.
					
					  El presente lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial,  que simboliza el vertiginoso desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas cosmicas de nuestro pais, realizado en el periodo conmovedor en que segun el grandioso proyecto del Dirigente Kim Jong Il avivan furiosamente en todo el pais  las llamas del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario para abrir sin falta las puertas a la gran potencia prospera hasta el ano 2012 en que se cumplira el centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, estimula grandemente a nuestro pueblo que se ha levantado como un solo hombre en el camino de la marcha general.
